sqlMap.statement: SELECT intfId AS "CODE" , intfName AS "NAME" , workGrpCd AS "WORKGRPCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 WHERE DELYN = '1' AND workGrpCd IN ( SELECT eaiBzwkDstcd FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIRM06 WHERE USERID = #loginId# )

SELECT A.INTFID AS "INTFID" , A.FILENAMEPTRN AS "FILENAMEPTRN" , A.TRANSFREQ AS "TRANSFREQ" , A.SIZEONCE AS "SIZEONCE" , A.PROCTERM AS "PROCTERM" , A.REQCHGR AS "REQCHGR" , A.REQCHGRTLNO AS "REQCHGRTLNO" , A.RESCHGR AS "RESCHGR" , A.RESCHGRTLNO AS "RESCHGRTLNO" , A.DELYN AS "DELYN" , B.WORKGRPCD AS "WORKGRPCD" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA06 A , $schemaId$.TSEAIEA04 B WHERE A.intfId = B.intfId AND A.intfId = #intfId# AND A.fileNamePtrn = #fileNamePtrn#
DELETE FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEA06 WHERE intfId = #intfId# AND fileNamePtrn = #fileNamePtrn#
